Sentencas: This study is aimed at improving the electrochemical performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) by optimizing the pore structure of the supports.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Two planar NiO-8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia supports are prepared, one by the phase-inversion tape casting, and the other by conventional tape casting method using graphite as the pore former.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The former contains forger-like straight open large pores, while the latter contains randomly distributed and tortuous pores.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The steam electrolysis of the cells with different microstructure cathode supports is measured.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: The cell supported on the cathode with straight pores shows a high current density of 1.42 A cm(-2) and a H-2 production rate of 9.89 mL (STP) cm(-2) min(-1) at 1.3 V and 50 vol % humidity and 750 degrees C, while the cell supported on the cathode with tortuous pores shows a current density of only 0.91 A cm(-2) and a H-2 production rate of 6.34 mL cm(-2)min(-1).
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: It is concluded that the introduction of large straight open pores into the cathode support allows fast gas phase transport and thus minimizes the concentration polarization.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the straight pores could provide better access to the reaction site (the electrode functional layer), thereby reducing the activation polarization as well.
Titulo: The beneficial effects of straight open large pores in the support on steam electrolysis performance of electrode-supported solid oxide electrolysis cell
